error.connection-error: Pool Tool cannot be reached to gather the details.
error.unknown-epoch: Details for given epoch could not be fetched.

success.title: Successful!
success.default-locale: Locale '{{locale}}' has been set successfully as default.
success.default-stake-pool-id: Stakepool with ID '{{id}}' has successfully be set as default.
success.epoch-update-channel: The given channel will be used from now on for updates in the language {{locale}}'.
success.prefix-update: The new prefix for commands is '{{prefix}}'.

error.title: Command could not be performed!
error.locale-missing: This command expects a locale code as an argument. (e.g.: 'en' or 'de').
error.stake-pool-id-missing: his command expects the stakepool ID as an argument.
error.stake-pool-id-wrong: A stake pool ID must be exactly 64 characters long.
error.channel-wrong: The first argument must be a channel (e.g. #general).
error.epoch-number-missing: You must specify the number of the epoch for which the details shall be fetched.
error.default-stake-pool-not-set: You must specify the default stakepool for this command.
error.prefix-missing: You must specify the new prefix for commands.
